id: scenario-value-scanner-student-scenarios-educational-student mental health support as educational care infrastructure
title: Student mental health support as educational care infrastructure
description: Student mental health support as educational care infrastructure
content:
Scenario: Student mental health support as educational care infrastructure
    Given academic pressure threatens student mental health
    And learning requires emotional and psychological well-being
    When educational institutions provide mental health support
    Then the educational_elohim should recognize counseling as educational care
    And it should value mental health services as essential to learning
    And it should accumulate care tokens for peer emotional support
    And mental health work should be understood as educational infrastructure
    And the system should recognize that learning requires whole-person care
    And educational care economy includes psychological and emotional support
